titles.title: Secure Our Transit Systems from Chinese Interference Act
Secure Our Transit Systems from Chinese Interference Act
Secure Our Transit Systems from Chinese Interference Act

A bill to repeal the temporary exemption to the certification requirement under section 5323 of title 49, United States Code, for contracts between public transportation agencies and rolling stock manufacturers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
